CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 1, 1952, pg. 24 reads: "Red Cross Youth Team - Members of the Youth Team of the 1952 Red Cross Membership Roll Campaign are shown as they met at the home of Mrs. William Goode this week before starting out to solicit contributions in current campaign. The group of attractive and popular young ladies includes, seated at the table, Sherlyn Dudley, Lyda Jo Boswell, Patricia Knott, Charlotte Carter, Betty Love, Louise Hampton and Jean Bell.  Standing: Marcia Nickens, Delphina Bray, Barbara Ann Boswell, Jeannette Terry, Carmen Young, Barbara Goggin, Paquita Harris, Gwendolyn Poinsette, Audrey Cyrus, Cecelia Trower, Patricia Lightfoot and Jeanine Henry. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Youth Team of 1952 Red Cross Membership Roll Campaign members, seated: Sherlyn Dudley, Lyda Jo Boswell, Patricia Knott, Charlotte Carter, Betty Love, Louise Hampton and Jean Bell; standing: Marcia Nickens, Delphina Bray, Barbara Ann Boswell, Jeannette Terry, Carmen Young, Barbara Goggin, Paquita Harris, Gwendolyn Poinsette, Audrey Cyrus, Cecelia Trower (Epperson), Patricia Lightfoot, and Jeanine Henry, gathered in home of Mrs. William Goode, another version
